data.author: Gert Menke

changelog.release_notes: Fixed: Watchface did not redraw correctly when regaining focus, i.e. after notifications.
Now compatible with Pebble Time Round.

Bugfixes:
- Screen was always inverted for a brief moment on program start
- Invert display setting got lost on program start

Features:
- Antialiasing for Arcs on Basalt platform (Pebble Time)
- Colorful NoBT-Icons on Basalt platfom
- Separate options for battery indicator when charging/discharging

The watchface is still mostly b/w and I am not sure yet if I want to keep it that way. I need to play with my Pebble Time some more. A bit of color might be nice, especially with the bright background setting. We'll see.
Finally fixed the bug that broke the settings page.
New option: Small digital display. Allows for a slightly bigger hour hand.

Added option for hour arc vs. hour hand.
Slightly nicer default values.

New features:
- Indicator for Bluetooth connection (only visible when not connected)
- Vibrate on BT connection change
Configuration page now remembers current settings.

Added a configuration page (not finished yet, but working).
New options:
- Invert colors
- Show/hide seconds (hide to save power)
- Show/hide digital time/date display
Use the current locale (as configured in the pebble settings) for week days.

data.description:
A distinct arc for minutes, a small hour arc or hand that's clearly visible but does not distract from the minutes arc, and a subtle seconds display.

Additional features include a (subtle) battery indicator and a warning when the bluetooth connection is lost.

Feedback is welcome.
Want colors? Try Arc2!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed: Watchface did not redraw correctly when regaining focus, i.e. after notifications.

data.title: Arc1
